events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible since this is very frustrating.
Case has been classified under the Refund cluster due to customer's request to return the wrong product received.
Support agent Jamie has been assigned to handle the refund request related to the incorrect item delivered.
Hello, this is Jamie from customer support. I am here to help you with the refund process for the item you received in error.
Could you please provide the order number and photos of the wrong item you received so we can proceed with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 789456123 and I have attached pictures showing that I got a different product than what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and provide a prepaid label for the return shipment.
I appreciate the quick response and the convenience of the prepaid return label. Thank you for handling this promptly.
The refund has been processed and you should see the credit on your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since there have been no further replies, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting our support team.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey to provide feedback on your recent refund experience.
